Posts.Content: Debi, my sister sent me your message because I have stage IV breast cancer and have 2 children and have been fighting it for over a year now. I still walk 2 to 3 miles a day, drink a lot of green tea and eat right. I am like you, I want to see my boys grow up and go to college. You have a wonderful attitude! Keep it up! Karen
Posts.Title: Stage 4 breast cancer, need help

Posts.Content: Hello! I am stage 4 breast cancer and I am also not ready to give up on life. I am walking about 2 to 3 miles a day and find this helps. My cancer came back in October 2001, I am 44 years old. Let me know about yourself, it is nice to talk with someone who knows exactly how you feel. Karen.
Posts.Title: Stage 4 breast cancer, need help
